explains: v. 集权控制，使集中；实行中央集权

sentences.en: In the mass production era, multinational firms tended to centralize their operations.
sentences.cn: 在大规模生产时期，跨国公司倾向于集中运营。

sentences.en: In order to raise the efficiency of the water supply, measures should be taken to centralize the management of water resources.
sentences.cn: 为了提高供水效率，应采取集中管理水资源的措施。

sentences.en: Centralize business processes across business units.
sentences.cn: 将业务流程跨业务单位集中。
